scenes.action_text: COBB Written by RON SHELTON Based on material by AL STUMP July 1993 Draft FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY Do not go gentle into that good night, Old age should burn and rave at close of day; Rage, rage against the dying of the light. Dylan Thomas Nice guys finish last. Leo Durocher 1 INT. OLD OFFICE (SANTA BARBARA, CA) - DAY (1960) 1 The room is California Spanish, thick walls, arches, and light spills in from a mission window.
